Package uk.ac.brighton.uni.ab607.mmorpg.server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DBAccess
    Handles all DB operations
    GameAccount
    One client's account Username is also the player's name in game
    GameServer  
    ServerActionHandler
    Processes all client action requests
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadActionRequestException
    This exception is raised when there is something wrong with the action requested by game client Possible causes: wrong data format, invalid values
